content.rendered:
Visit SSOM

Eat, drink, shop, and relax at our FREE monthly neighborhood street festival. Rain or shine, we’ll be there!

(inclement weather cancelation due to lightning or severe storms will be announced the day before)

Explore Main Street

Each second Sunday,Â Main Street’s 30+ shops, galleries, restaurants, and bars will be open.Â Check out the special sales and events!

Transit, Parking, & More

Parking:

Public parking:Â View map. Please note most parking lots and garages require payment.
Street Parking:

Please note that meters are in effect on Sundays from 1:00-7:00 PM; as well as OTR Resident Only parking

By Bus:

SSOM isÂ conveniently located along the #17, #19, #24Â and #16 Metro bus lines. Please exit before 12th Street or along Liberty as buses will not be allowed down Main Street during the festival.

By Bike:

Ample free bike parking at bike racks along Main Street.
Red BikeÂ stations are located at Main & Orchard, Vine Street, and Findlay Market. For details visit Redbike.
